ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend the course as an excellent overview of the work of a foundational political thinker.
take this course if you are intellectually invested in political philosophy. this is not a course for people who are just looking for a credit.
I would recommend this class unreservedly. This class has convinced me that I need to take more courses that focus on a single thinker.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: this course will help prepare grad students to teach aristotle, but its value is beyond its use in the discipline.
